description: HTML source code for a web-based database visualizer interface, including styling and client-side scripting for interacting with backend APIs to display database and table data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases from the backend and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading data from the backend.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expanding or collapsing a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display table data in a structured format.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, nulls, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better readability.
